about_the_game:
You are a bear, a bear dodging green bunnies and collecting delicious candy. You're running over bricks, climbing up ladders, traversing bars, floating on moving platforms, and pushing crates to reach that elusive next level.

Candy Bear 2 includes grass, mines, portals, gates, springs, lasers, and more.

The full version includes 120 challenging campaign levels, 80 classic levels, and over 45 bonus levels, ranging from easy to insanely difficult.

This free demo version includes the first 20 campaign levels, along with 9 of the bonus levels.

Candy Bear 2 includes grass, mines, portals, gates, springs, lasers, and more.

The full version includes 120 challenging campaign levels, 80 classic levels, and over 45 bonus levels, ranging from easy to insanely difficult.

This free demo version includes the first 20 campaign levels, along with 9 of the bonus levels.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Candy Bear 2 Demo

Minimum:

  • OS: 8
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: In this family-friendly 2-d action game, you are a bear dodging green bunnies and collecting delicious candy. You're running over bricks, climbing up ladders, traversing bars, floating on moving platforms, and pushing crates to reach the next level. This demo version includes 29 of the 240+ levels.
